LL power(LL b,LL e,LL mod)
{
	if(b==0 && e==0) return 1;
	if(b==0 && e>1)  return 0;	
	if(b>0 && e==0) return 1;
	LL r=1;
	while(e)
	{
		if(e&1) { r = r*b; r%=mod;  }
		e >>= 1; b = b*b; b%=mod;
		
	}
return r;
}

LL gcd(LL a, LL b) {  if(b==0) return a;  else return gcd(b,a%b);  }


int main() {
 
int test; INT(test);
 
	while(test--) {
		
		int k,n;

		INT(k); INT(n);

		if(n==1) {
			
			PINT(1); continue;
		}

		if(n==2 || n==3) {

			PINT(k); continue;

		}

		LL ans = power(k,power(2,n-3,MOD-1)%(MOD-1),MOD)%MOD;

		PLLD(ans);	
	

	}
return 0;
}
